'''Philosophies of the Land of Wind''' is one of the [[Philosophies of the Land]] rewards obtained from the [[Battle Pass]] after purchasing the Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus.

After reaching the prerequisite levels, collecting the box will prompt the player to choose between one of the following:
{{Card|Philosophies of Freedom|5|show_caption=1}}
{{Card|Philosophies of Resistance|5|show_caption=1}}
{{Card|Philosophies of Ballad|5|show_caption=1}}
